# Copilot Instructions

<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

This is an Astro project. When working with this codebase:

- Use modern JavaScript/TypeScript syntax and patterns
- Follow Astro's component-based architecture
- Prefer static generation where possible
- Use Astro's built-in features like islands architecture for interactive components
- Follow Astro's file-based routing conventions
- Use the `.astro` file extension for Astro components
- Leverage Astro's component script and template sections appropriately
